paper.title: An O(n) Bin-packing algorithm for uniformly distributed data

author.org: Department of Computer Science, József Attila University Szeged, Szeged, Hungary
Lehrstuhl für Angewandte Mathematik II, Universität Augsburg, Augsburg, Germany

paper.abstract: We give a first-fit type algorithm, with running timeO(n), for the classical one-dimensional bin-packing problem, and examine it from a probabilistic point of view. Our main result is that the expected waste for this algorithm isO(n2/3).
